attributes.action: Remove cost of disposal of waste at coucil own tip
attributes.additional_details: Cheshire West and Chester Council as from the 1st April 2022 are imposing a cost  for residents of the area to dispose of ribble plaster board and other general diy waste. They items have and should remain as household waste and be disposed of without extra costs
attributes.background: Review the cost being imposed by Cheshire West and Chester Council for residents of the area to dispose of waste at thier waste disposal sites

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local charges for waste disposal are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
